verbs.description: [V: Comparing] [ARG1: our country] [ARGM-MNR: unfavorably] [ARG2: to a totalitarian state] seems to be a favorite pastime of Joy Behar and the women at The View . At reports that the Trump Administration was separating families at the border who tried to cross illegally , the hosts freaked out and claimed that this was a “ human rights violation ” akin to what Hitler and Kim Jong - un did to their people .
